title: Migrate
description:
Leverage the define migration solution to automate migration of the asset to the cloud. This step may be best executed as a single task for all assets associated with this workload.
Guide https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/azure-migration-guide/migrate
Considerations: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/cloud-adoption/migrate/migration-considerations/migrate/
